fr.ecp.Group52_Project_IS1220_part1_AVEROUS_TOPUZ.Model.Network.User.Card

Class Vmax

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.ecp.Group52_Project_IS1220_part1_AVEROUS_TOPUZ.Model.Network.User.Card.Card
      • fr.ecp.Group52_Project_IS1220_part1_AVEROUS_TOPUZ.Model.Network.User.Card.Vmax

  • public class Vmax
extends Card
    The Vmax class extends the abstract class Card and defines the type of card corresponding to a Vmax card.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Pierre Averous, Nicolas Topuz
    See Also:
    Card, CardTypes, User

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Vmax(User user)
      A constructor creating a Vmax card object, assigning it a user, a unique card number and incrementing the card counter

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double pay(BikesType type, double rideDuration)
      This method returns the price to pay for a given type of bike rented for a given duration, depending on the card the user owns (or if he has none)
